name: Xtreme Club Racing
description:
Get behind the wheel in one of eShop's most frantic extreme driving games. Travel back in time with a flashback to the ARCADES

with pure ARCADE style retro-playability.

Tracks in the mountain with different theme park type settings.

Many and diverse interactive elements in the competition where the driver's driving and reflexes are put to the test.

Upload the experience by winning various stages and you will gain access to new vehicles. Get coins and buy improvements to upgrade them. Nitros (turbos), Power of resistance, Manoeuvrability are the elements with which you can pimp your cars.

Jumps, chicanes, dizzying speeds, slopes, skids and very aggressive and challenging competitors are part of what 'Xtreme Club Racing' can offer you. Do not miss it... good luck...

- Pure arcade style gameplay just like in the arcades.

- Train in a simulator to improve your driving with several different challenges.

- Pass 4 tests in the simulator to access the club and compete with the great drivers.

- Many stages with several settings with different themes (Japan, Egypt, The west... :)

- Vehicles with different characteristics and with several mechanical improvements.

- Replayability! Get each circuit’s 3 medals

- Levels are fully procedurally generated.
